resources.string: A boy swallows a cursed object and becomes a vessel of a powerful demon. He joins a sorcerer school to fight curses.
Humanity battles giant man-eating titans in a desperate attempt to survive behind massive walls.
A shocking reincarnation tale about the dark side of Japan\'s entertainment industry and the quest for revenge.
A small-town boy senses something is off when his best friend comes back different.
Poster anime The Summer Hikaru Died
In a world full of superpowers (quirks), a powerless boy enters the top hero school to become the Symbol of Peace.
Denji, a devil hunter with a chainsaw demon inside him, fights brutal devils in a world where fear manifests as monsters.
A spy must build a fake family to complete his mission—only to discover his “wife” is an assassin and “daughter” a telepath.
After Japan\'s loss in the World Cup, a radical football program aims to create the ultimate egotist striker.
A man travels back in time to high school to stop the death of his girlfriend and change the future.
A high school student gains a notebook that can kill anyone whose name is written in it—sparking a global manhunt.
